svg.title: Zero Trust deployment plan with Microsoft 365

g.desc: Configure cloud identity: cloud only, hybrid with Password Ha...
g.text: Configure cloud identity: cloud only, hybrid with Password Hash Synchronization (PHS), hybrid with Pass-Through Authentication (PTA), or federated

g.desc: Configure compliance policies To be sure devices meet minimum...
g.text: Configure compliance policies To be sure devices meet minimum requirements

g.title: Rectangle.1136

g.text: Configure Enterprise (recommended) Zero Trust identity and device access policies Require healthy and compliant devices

g.text: Pilot and deploy Microsoft 365 Defender XDR

g.title: Sheet.1220
g.desc: Configure Starting point Zero Trust identity and device acces...
g.text: Configure Starting point Zero Trust identity and device access policies Turn on Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) and configure Intune app protection policies that don’t require managing devices
